name: Gidbo
0:
”Alexa, set bedroom to 20”
”Alexa, turn on the bedroom AC unit”
”Alexa, set the bedroom AC unit to cool”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Gidbo is a smart AC controller that connects any remote controlled AC to your WiFi so you can control it with an App from anywhere. Gidbo is compatible with Alexa so you can control your AC with voice commands.

Installation:
Before using Gidbo with Alexa, you need to own a Gidbo AC controller. Download the Gidbo app available for Android and Apple. Create a Gidbo account in the Gidbo app and follow the instructions to setup your Gidbo device.

You can then add the Gidbo skill in the Alexa app. Use your Gidbo account credentials to authorize Alexa to control your Gidbo devices.

Controls available in Alexa:
The Alexa skill can control the power (on, off), mode (cool, heat, auto, eco), temperature and fan speed.
